name: Part-Time Witch
description:
Thank you for joining the adventure to Hex Academy as a Part-Time Witch!

We made this game with a lot of love and hard work and just 3 days for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022! So we hope you like it! 

Please let us know what you think about it 

Controls: Prep StationQ Customer SideE Click and Drag ObjectsRight mouse click Credits:

Baggie - Artist

Cindy Rivera - UX/UI 

Cal Davitt - Programmer

Nicky B - Composer / SFX
